page.title: 11Mayday
page.content: May day celebrations are very old in the area.In the past children made may sticks and sang a special may song at front doors. The celebrations have been revived within the last 10 years.Now a May Queen is crowned and she is paraded around the village by the Morris men and children carrying Maysticks. The May Queen is chosen by th children of the village from the oldest girls at the primary school. The May Queen wears a white long dress and a crown of spring flowers and she carries a corn dolly staff.
